executiveSummary: This is a verification test of the new Morning Edition dashboard. The system is functioning correctly.

fieldIntelligence.headline: Morning Edition Dashboard Successfully Deployed
fieldIntelligence.summary: The dashboard is live and pulling the latest briefing payload from storage. Visual layout, auth, and ingest endpoint are all behaving as expected.

fieldIntelligence.headline: Vercel Deployment Pipeline Active
fieldIntelligence.summary: Build and deploy automation is running cleanly, with no red flags in the pipeline. This reduces the odds of the morning briefing arriving half-baked.

newsletters.subject: The Morning Edition Test Newsletter
newsletters.summary: This is a sample newsletter item to verify rendering. In production, this comes from Gmail label: newsletters.
